title: AMR Archive - Alternative Medicine Review
cleaned_text: Alternative Medicine Review (AMR) was the leading peer-reviewed journal from 1996 - 2010 designed for sharing information on the practical use of alternative and complementary medicine. The journal has promoted the practice of alternative therapies in a way that provides for a rational, individualized, and comprehensive approach to health care. Today, Alternative Medicine Review is the new, modernized approach for sharing this information. We have made the archived AMR content available since much of the value in these articles is still relevant to alternative care. - View all - Botanical - Botanicals - Cancer - Cardiovascular - Case Study - Eye Conditions - Gastrointestinal - Heavy Metals & Toxins - Immune System - Inflammation - Metabolic - Metabolic Conditions - Monograph - Musculoskeletal - Neurological - Nutrients - Other
